nodes.text: ZK-094R was an elite Skytrooper, a type of battle droid used by the Eternal Empire of the planet Zakuul, that was designated as the command unit for the shield bunker on the planet Belsavis that supported the Eternal Empire's Star Fortress in orbit. Around 3631 BBY, ZK-094R was destroyed by the Outlander and the Whiphid K'krohl, who invaded the bunker and destroyed it with explosives.
ZK-094R was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online rolepalying video game released by BioWare in 2011, in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 Digital Expansion.
